item.title: 57. Insert Interval
item.description: The Problem Statement This problem is taken from LeetCode. The Solution We will allocate a new std::vector and reserve a capacity of intervals.size() + 1. We loop over all intervals and during each step check if the end of the newInterval is smaller than the head of the current interval.
